original_title: César Menéndez: el cazador de fantasías
overview: César Menéndez confesses that he has lived and, at the same time, is a man condemned to paint. Through a brief tour we enter the interior of his work and his world, loaded with a great religious and sacrilegious metaphor, in the tradition of Luis Buñuel or Federico Fellini.
title: César Menéndez: el cazador de fantasías
